author: DratVanity

text:
I'm currently replaying the DS version of this, decided to give it another go as I never finished. I prefer VIII, but I'm loving it so far (getting the two Rings atm) and the music is brilliant, so that might change. <3
The only other DQ I've played is IX, which was good, but lacked characters due to being built around multiplayer. I can see why people are apprehensive about X being online, but I'm looking forward to it a lot.

text:
Still my favorite in the series. I have the DS remake but I haven't played it yet.

It will be interesting to see what happens with DQ10 on the Wii, with it having online and all. I'll probably be playing it offline myself, I'm not a very big online console player.
